War of the Maidens (German: Der Jungfrauenkrieg) is a 1957 Austrian-German comedy film directed by Hermann Kugelstadt and starring Oskar Sima, Kurt Heintel and Mady Rahl. It was shot at the Sch√∂nbrunn Studios in Vienna and at the studios in Salzburg. The film's sets were designed by the art director Wolf Witzemann.
